# ğŸ¤– Alpha Insights - AI-Powered Research Platform

**Professional stock and crypto research reports generated by 6 specialized AI agents.**

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Firebase](https://img.shields.io/badge/Firebase-FFCA28?logo=firebase&logoColor=black)](https://firebase.google.com/)
[![OpenClaw](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenClaw-AI_Agents-blue)](https://openclaw.ai/)
[![Angular](https://img.shields.io/badge/Angular-17-red?logo=angular)](https://angular.io/)

---

## ğŸŒŸ What is Alpha Insights?

Alpha Insights is an **AI research platform** that uses **6 specialized AI agents** working together to produce **Wall Street Journal-quality analysis** for stocks and cryptocurrencies.

**Think of it like a research team:**
- ğŸŒ World Events Analyst - Macro context
- ğŸ“Š Technical Analyst - Charts & indicators
- ğŸ“° News Analyst - Recent news & earnings
- ğŸ’° Price Analyst - Volatility & risk analysis
- ğŸ“ Report Writer - Synthesis & narrative
- âœ… Verdict Analyst - Final recommendation

**Result:** Professional research reports in ~40-50 minutes, automatically generated and delivered via web app.

**Live Demo:** [https://alpha-insights-84c51.web.app](https://alpha-insights-84c51.web.app)

---

## âœ¨ Features

### For Users
- âœ… **Custom research requests** - Enter any ticker (AAPL, BTC, TSLA, etc.)
- âœ… **WSJ-quality analysis** - Professional reports with exact numbers, tables, confidence scores
- âœ… **Multiple perspectives** - Technical, fundamental, macro, news analysis
- âœ… **Actionable recommendations** - Entry/target/stop levels, risk/reward ratios
- âœ… **Real-time updates** - See reports as they're generated
- âœ… **Watchlists** - Track your favorite tickers

### For Developers
- âœ… **Multi-agent architecture** - 6 specialized AI agents with sequential dependencies
- âœ… **OpenClaw integration** - Agent orchestration framework
- âœ… **Firebase backend** - Firestore, Auth, Functions, Hosting
- âœ… **Real-time monitoring** - Systemd service for automatic processing
- âœ… **Scalable design** - Handles concurrent requests
- âœ… **Fully documented** - Complete deployment guides and architecture docs

---

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### For Users

**Just want to use it?**

Visit: **[https://alpha-insights-84c51.web.app](https://alpha-insights-84c51.web.app)**

1. Create account (email/password)
2. Browse research reports feed
3. Submit custom analysis request
4. Wait ~40-50 minutes for your report
5. View professional analysis with charts and recommendations

### For Deployers

**Want to run your own instance?**

**ğŸ“– Read the [COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md](COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md)** â­

**Quick overview:**
1. Install OpenClaw + Firebase CLI
2. Clone this repo
3. Configure Firebase project
4. Deploy orchestrator service
5. Deploy web app

**Time:** ~1-2 hours for full deployment

### For Developers

**Want to contribute or understand the code?**

**ğŸ“– Read [HOW_IT_WORKS.md](HOW_IT_WORKS.md)** ğŸ§ 

**Quick start:**
```bash
# Clone repo
git clone https://github.com/GeraldsCreations/alpha-insights-app.git
cd alpha-insights-app

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run research pipeline (requires OpenClaw)
cd scripts
ts-node research-orchestrator.ts AAPL stock

# Run web app
ionic serve
```

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

### Frontend
- **Angular 17** - Modern web framework
- **Ionic 7** - Mobile-friendly UI components
- **TypeScript** - Type-safe development
- **Firebase SDK** - Real-time updates

### Backend
- **Firebase** - Backend-as-a-Service
  - Firestore - NoSQL database
  - Authentication - User management
  - Cloud Functions - Serverless logic
  - Hosting - Static site hosting
- **Node.js** - Research orchestrator service
- **Systemd** - Service management

### AI Layer
- **OpenClaw** - Agent orchestration framework
- **Claude Sonnet 4.5** - Primary AI model (Anthropic)
- **GPT-4** - Alternative model (OpenAI)
- **Agent Tools** - web_search, web_fetch, read, write, etc.

### Data Sources
- **Yahoo Finance API** - Stock price data (free)
- **CoinGecko API** - Crypto price data (free tier)
- **Web Search** - Real-time news and analysis

---

## ğŸ“Š Performance

- **Processing Time:** ~40-50 minutes per ticker
- **Cost per Report:** ~$0.50-$2.00 (LLM API usage)
- **Success Rate:** ~95% (with automatic retries)
- **Concurrent Capacity:** Multiple requests supported
- **Output Quality:** WSJ-level professional analysis

---

## ğŸ¯ Use Cases

### For Individual Investors
- **Due diligence** - Research before investing
- **Portfolio monitoring** - Track holdings
- **Discovery** - Find new opportunities
- **Learning** - Understand market analysis

### For Trading Teams
- **Research automation** - Scale analysis capacity
- **Consistent methodology** - Standardized research process
- **Coverage expansion** - Analyze more tickers
- **Preliminary research** - Pre-analyst screening

### For Educators
- **Teaching tool** - Demonstrate professional research
- **Case studies** - Real-world analysis examples
- **Student projects** - Build on existing platform

---

## ğŸ”’ Security

- âœ… **Firebase Authentication** - Secure user management
- âœ… **Firestore Security Rules** - Row-level security
- âœ… **API Key Protection** - Keys stored securely, never exposed
- âœ… **HTTPS Only** - All connections encrypted
- âœ… **No PII storage** - Minimal personal data collected

**Security audit:** [COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md](COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md) Â§ Security

---

## ğŸ’° Cost Breakdown

### Free Tier (MVP)
- **Firebase:** Free tier (Spark plan)
- **CoinGecko:** Free tier (30 calls/min)
- **Yahoo Finance:** Free (unlimited)
- **OpenClaw:** Self-hosted (no licensing)

**Only cost:** LLM API usage (~$0.50-$2.00 per report)

### Scale Pricing (100 reports/month)
- **LLM APIs:** ~$50-$200/month
- **Firebase:** Still free tier
- **Total:** ~$50-$200/month

### Scale Pricing (1000 reports/month)
- **LLM APIs:** ~$500-$2000/month
- **Firebase:** Blaze plan (~$25-$100/month)
- **Total:** ~$525-$2100/month

**Cost optimization tips:** [COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md](COMPLETE_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md) Â§ Cost Estimates
